title: Structural and optical properties of phosphorous doped nanocrystalline silicon deposited using a VHF PECVD process for silicon heterojunction solar cells and optimization of a simple p–n junction cell using SCAP-1D tool
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,23873-23885
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA02429J, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Vijay Kumar Gill, Sucheta Juneja, Shiv Kumar Dixit, Shruti Vashist, Sushil Kumar
n-Type silicon (Si) films have been synthesized using a PECVD method and the effect of phosphorus doping on the optical properties is analyzed.
